page.title: 01WOOKEY HOLE LOCAL AREA.
page.content: WOOKEY HOLE IS A WELL KNOWN SOMERSET TOURIST AREA, FAMOUS FOR ITS CAVES AND WITCH. IT IS WITHIN EASY REACH OF WELLS, CHEDDAR, GLASTONBURY, AND BATH. AROUND WOOKEY HOLE THERE IS BEAUTIFUL HILLY COUNTYRYSIDE,WOODLAND AND FARMLAND. THERE IS A NATURE RESERVE AT EBBOR GORGE WITH VIEWS OVER EASTON AND WELLS. THE RIVER AXE FLOWS THROUGH THE CAVES AND VILLAGE ON ITS WAY TO WESTON_SUPER_MARE. WOOKEY HOLE HAS THE USUAL VILLAGE AMENITIES AND ALSO CARAVAN SITES, INN,RIDING STABLES AND OUTDOOR SWIMMING POOL. IT IS A VERY PLEASANT PLACE TO LIVE AND IS PARTICULARLY QUIET IN THE WINTER WHEN THERE ARE FEWER VISITORS.
